offerings.title: Career Strategy Sessions
offerings.for: Early to mid-career professionals feeling stuck or uncertain about their next move
offerings.outcome: Gain clarity on your career direction, identify skill gaps, and create an actionable 90-day roadmap

offerings.title: Technical Leadership Coaching
offerings.for: Senior engineers transitioning to leadership roles or new managers seeking guidance
offerings.outcome: Develop leadership mindset, learn to balance technical and people responsibilities, and build high-performing teams

offerings.title: Product Building Mentorship
offerings.for: Indie hackers and solo founders working on their first or next product
offerings.outcome: Get feedback on your product ideas, prioritize features, and learn strategies to build and launch efficiently

offerings.title: AI Integration Consulting
offerings.for: Teams and individuals looking to leverage AI tools in their workflow
offerings.outcome: Identify AI opportunities in your work, implement practical solutions, and build sustainable AI-augmented processes
